item.description:
Join NHCer Josh at a Professional Networking Happy Hour.

The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear in New Haven on Thursday, November 8, 2012. The event is from 5:30 – 8:00.

This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Address: Black Bear Saloon – 124 Temple Street, New Haven, CT

Drink Specials and Free Food: Black Bear will be providing $2 draft beers and wells drinks along with a selection of free appetizers to all attendees.

Josh will be attending the event as Host and can be contacted at (203)772-0070 if anyone has any questions.

Don't Forget your Business Cards!

For Happy Hour type Events, please note in your RSVP section if you are only a "Maybe".
item.how_to_find_us: If you need help, look for or contact Josh at 203-772-0070 .
item.name: Young Professionals Networking Happy Hour
